items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: ShadowDomKit is a lightweight JavaScript utility designed to solve the challenges of working with components inside Shadow DOM. It provides a simple, consistent API for finding elements and initializing JavaScript components across Shadow DOM boundaries.
items.title: ssanaullahrais/shadow-dom-kit: ShadowDomKit is a lightweight JavaScript utility designed to solve the challenges of working with components inside Shadow DOM. It provides a simple, consistent API for finding elements and initializing JavaScript components across Shadow DOM boundaries.

items.content_html: A lightweight SCADA-like interface prototype that simulates industrial process monitoring. Features include animated flow visualization, temperature/pressure sensors, warning logic, and real-time status display using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
items.title: YaroslavKS/Mini_SCADA_presentation: A lightweight SCADA-like interface prototype that simulates industrial process monitoring. Features include animated flow visualization, temperature/pressure sensors, warning logic, and real-time status display using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
